column4: OK ... yeah, i think it's probably nouveau interfering then. you have the nvidia installer ready?
what i would do is now that nouveau is blacklisted, reboot and reinstall the nvidia driver, then run nvidia-xconfig and reboot again
ops: sorry for the miscomplete, that appears to be an attack
could just be your client is using a different character set
IdleOne, Pici: well oops then. very sorry for overreacting.
